(This document appears blank, but when held with both hands displays a glowing rune. Examining it, you remember seeing someone in Highwatch with a similar design on his armor.)

- Accepting this quest will destroy this document.

That rune! By Kaia's mercy, I thought all of those were lost to time!

What you have in your hands is a knowledge rune, used by ancient amani master craftsmen to record their most powerful designs. My own family has done quite well translating and applying these to modern weapons and armor.

With your permission, may I examine the document?

Fantastic. These designs...if your skill is sufficient to the task, you will soon craft some remarkable things.

I have translated the document so that you can upgrade your equipment. I look forward fighting alongside you someday, and seeing the results.
